name: 4X Space Time Shipyard
description:
-Release your creativity! Get a head start on creating 3d models for your armadas to use in the 4X strategy game 4X Space Time, currently in development

-Change the shape of basic objects by scaling the individual axis of basic pieces

-Create low poly 3D ships by snapping pieces together

-Remove or edit placed pieces

-Design the hulls of fighters, transports, carriers, frigates, battleships…

-Exports 3d models in .OBJ format

-Use the models you create in anyway you see fit. Display them on the web, use them in your own applications...
